title: Prime Mathematics Education

location.copy: Courses will be held in Scarsdale at the
location.address: Located at 270 Ardsley Rd, Scarsdale, NY 10583

about.title: Summer Math Enrichment Series
sections: Prime Mathematics Education is offering summer math classes to enrich and prepare students for the coming school year.

Head-Start classes (two weeks) are available for students entering Geometry, Algebra I, or Algebra II. Students will learn concepts and problem-solving skills that will help them excel in the subject.
Intensive SAT Math preparation (four weeks) is available. SAT classes focus on mastering the foundations. Emphasis is placed on understanding the concepts, not on test-taking tricks.
Algebra classes are available for motivated students entering 6th grade. These classes will challenge students and build a strong foundation.

courses.title: Geometry Head-Start
bulletPoints: Covers angles, properties of polygons and proofs

courses.title: Algebra II Head-Start
bulletPoints: Covers radicals, complex numbers and quadratics

registerSuccessCopy: Thank you for your inquery an email has been sent to the instructor. You will recieve a phone call ASAP
